articles.description: Homes in New York and Miami are most likely to be hit by hurricanes this season, according to CoreLogic
articles.content: As the country enters hurricane season from June 1 to the end of November, homes in New York and Miami are at the highest risk for property damage, according to a report released Wednesday from housi… [+4357 chars]
